${ModID}:SnapperTrap.NAME: Snapper Trap
${ModID}:SnapperTrap.FLAVOR: A cruel device, turned against those who thought to tame the Fogland Wilds.

${ModID}:Jinx.NAME: Jinx
${ModID}:Jinx.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage{!Upgrades!|>0= and apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict to ALL enemies|@=. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict}.

${ModID}:Attunement.NAME: Attunement
${ModID}:Attunement.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! ${ModID}:Mojo.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! Maledict to ALL enemies.}

${ModID}:Blast.NAME: Blast
${ModID}:Blast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Deal !D! damage{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= and apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison} to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RefinedBlast.NAME: Refined Blast
${ModID}:RefinedBlast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL A random enemy loses !D! HP.{!${ModID}:m2!|>0= Apply !${ModID}:m2! Poison to them.} NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShadowFont.NAME: Shadow Font
${ModID}:ShadowFont.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Blast{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your hand.

${ModID}:SnareTrap.NAME: Snare Trap
${ModID}:SnareTrap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Enemy's attacks deal !M! less damage until after their next attack.

${ModID}:FirebombTrap.NAME: Firebomb Trap
${ModID}:FirebombTrap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL At the end of your next turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Tripwire.NAME: Tripwire
${ModID}:Tripwire.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s} and gain 50% more Block from cards.

${ModID}:PressurePlate.NAME: Pressure Plate
${ModID}:PressurePlate.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !M! *Mark. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.

${ModID}:Walkabout.NAME: Walkabout
${ModID}:Walkabout.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
${ModID}:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Scry !${ModID}:m2!. NL If all cards were discarded, add !M! *Blast{!M!|>1=s} into your hand.

${ModID}:FlockOfBats.NAME: Flock of Bats
${ModID}:FlockOfBats.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Bushwhack.NAME: Bushwhack
${ModID}:Bushwhack.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. If you have played less than !${ModID}:m3! cards this combat, gain !${ModID}:m2! *Plated *Armor.{!M!|1= NL (!M! card played.)|0,>1= NL (!M! cards played.)}

${ModID}:Submerge.NAME: Submerge
${ModID}:Submerge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Void into your discard pile.

${ModID}:VilePowder.NAME: Vile Powder
${ModID}:VilePowder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:TheRumble.NAME: The Rumble
${ModID}:TheRumble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Big_Game: Repeat.

${ModID}:BagAndTag.NAME: Bag and Tag
${ModID}:BagAndTag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap twice.

${ModID}:PlagueOfToads.NAME: Plague of Toads
${ModID}:PlagueOfToads.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:Blunderbuss.NAME: Blunderbuss
${ModID}:Blunderbuss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each Retain card in your hand.

${ModID}:HeavyStick.NAME: Heavy Stick
${ModID}:HeavyStick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your ${ModID}:Spines.

${ModID}:Blowpipe.NAME: Blowpipe
${ModID}:Blowpipe.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Put !M! Unplayable card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw or discard pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select a card to move to your hand.
Select cards to move to your hand.

${ModID}:SneakierStrike.NAME: Sneakier Strike
${ModID}:SneakierStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Scried this turn, gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]} and apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Venom.

${ModID}:DarkRitual.NAME: Sinister Ritual
${ModID}:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Next turn, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SwarmOfBeetles.NAME: Swarm of Beetles
${ModID}:SwarmOfBeetles.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:BadMedicine.NAME: Bad Medicine
${ModID}:BadMedicine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Regen.

${ModID}:RestlessSpirits.NAME: Restless Spirits
${ModID}:RestlessSpirits.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, add a *Blast into your hand.

${ModID}:Darkvision.NAME: Darkvision
${ModID}:Darkvision.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, Scry !M!. If you discard at least !${ModID}:m2! card{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} this way, gain [E].

${ModID}:Portents.NAME: Portents
${ModID}:Portents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card via Scry, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:IllIntendedSchemes.NAME: Cruel Schemes
${ModID}:IllIntendedSchemes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Retained, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:OthersiderForm.NAME: Othersider Form
${ModID}:OthersiderForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Mojo and lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:SpiritualJourney.NAME: Spiritual Journey
${ModID}:SpiritualJourney.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Raise your Max HP by !M!. The next !${ModID}:m2! time{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} you play an Attack, lose 1 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TrapperMaster.NAME: Trapper Master
${ModID}:TrapperMaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Gain [E] for each ${ModID}:Trap in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DeathWard.NAME: Death Ward
${ModID}:DeathWard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !${ModID}:m2! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:BriarPatch.NAME: Briar Patch
${ModID}:BriarPatch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Spines. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal damage back equal to !${ModID}:m2!% of your total ${ModID}:Spines.

${ModID}:CampOut.NAME: Camp Out
${ModID}:CampOut.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose *Bonfire{!Upgrades!|>0=+} or *Forge{!Upgrades!|>0=+} to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Bonfire.NAME: Bonfire
${ModID}:Bonfire.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Forge.NAME: Forge
${ModID}:Forge.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Increase the damage of all Attacks in your hand by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlendingIn.NAME: Blending In
${ModID}:BlendingIn.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Now and at the start of your turn, if any enemy isn't attacking, gain {!M!|>0=!M! Block and }!${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Blur.

${ModID}:SpinningBlades.NAME: Spinning Blades
${ModID}:SpinningBlades.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:VengefulTotem.NAME: Vengeful Totem
${ModID}:VengefulTotem.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict. NL Add !${ModID}:m2! *Blast{!${ModID}:m2!|>1=s} into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Big_Game: Upgrade {!${ModID}:m2!|1=it|@=them}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:HexingTotem.NAME: Ritual Totem
${ModID}:HexingTotem.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Mojo. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WardingTotem.NAME: Warding Totem
${ModID}:WardingTotem.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Gain !M! *Plated *Armor. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CageOfSerpents.NAME: Cage of Serpents
${ModID}:CageOfSerpents.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Apply !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Venom. NL Enemy loses !D! HP !M! times.

${ModID}:Minefield.NAME: Minefield
${ModID}:Minefield.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${ModID}:AcidCloud.NAME: Acid Cloud
${ModID}:AcidCloud.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !${ModID}:m2! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BrambleShield.NAME: Bramble Shield
${ModID}:BrambleShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains additional Block equal to your ${ModID}:Spines.

${ModID}:EagleEyes.NAME: Eagle Eyes
${ModID}:EagleEyes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Scry !M! for each enemy in combat.

${ModID}:BarbedLasso.NAME: Barbed Lasso
${ModID}:BarbedLasso.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a Skill this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

${ModID}:SpitefulStaff.NAME: Spiteful Staff
${ModID}:SpitefulStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Maledict. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom.

${ModID}:Stalker.NAME: Stalker
${ModID}:Stalker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded via Scry, play it and increase its damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:Incarcerate.NAME: Incarcerate
${ModID}:Incarcerate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X times. NL Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times.

${ModID}:HairTrigger.NAME: Hair Trigger
${ModID}:HairTrigger.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:BroilingFlames.NAME: Broiling Flames
${ModID}:BroilingFlames.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Burn into your hand.

${ModID}:Shank.NAME: Shank
${ModID}:Shank.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Discard the rightmost card in your hand.

${ModID}:JarOfSpiders.NAME: Jar of Spiders
${ModID}:JarOfSpiders.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. They lose !M! HP at the start of their next turn.

${ModID}:BoulderTrap.NAME: Boulder Trap
${ModID}:BoulderTrap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL First {!${ModID}:m2!|1=trigger does|@=!${ModID}:m2!triggers do} nothing, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.{!Location!|0,1,2,3= NL (Triggered !M! times.)}

${ModID}:SludgeBomb.NAME: Sludge Bomb
${ModID}:SludgeBomb.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Trap. NL ALL enemies lose !D! HP and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:NightTerror.NAME: Night Terror
${ModID}:NightTerror.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Drawn butter... NL Boiling water... NL @Lemon@ @Wedges..!@

${ModID}:NaturesWrath.NAME: Nature's Wrath
${ModID}:NaturesWrath.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each of your unique buffs.{!M!|1= NL (You have !M! buff.)|>-1= NL (You have !M! buffs.)}

${ModID}:GoForTheThroat.NAME: Go For The Throat
${ModID}:GoForTheThroat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL ${ModID}:Big_Game: also deal !${ModID}:sd! damage once.

${ModID}:UnstableConcoction.NAME: Unstable Concoction
${ModID}:UnstableConcoction.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. Obtain NL an {!Upgrades!|>0=${ModID}:Explosive_Potion+|@=*Explosive *Potion}. NL ${ModID}:Big_Game: Obtain a {!Upgrades!|>0=${ModID}:Fire_Potion+|@=*Fire *Potion} instead. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CorpseFlies.NAME: Corpse Flies
${ModID}:CorpseFlies.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage.{!Upgrades!|>0= NL Draw 1 card.} NL If Fatal, {!Upgrades!|0=permanently Upgrade this card|@=add a *Corpse *Flies to your deck}. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WildMagic.NAME: Wild Magic
${ModID}:WildMagic.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Transform up to !M! cards in your draw pile into{!Upgrades!|>0= Upgraded} cards of any color.

${ModID}:Hoodwink.NAME: Hoodwink
${ModID}:Hoodwink.DESCRIPTION: {@@}stslib:Snecko. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy {!M!|-1=a number of times equal to this card's cost + !${ModID}:m2!|@=!M! times}.

${ModID}:DollsCurse.NAME: Doll's Curse
${ModID}:DollsCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. When drawn, gain !M! ${ModID}:Mojo. NL Cannot be removed from your deck.

${ModID}:WitchingHour.NAME: Bewitch
${ModID}:WitchingHour.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you apply a debuff to this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Friends.NAME: Friends
${ModID}:Friends.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 ${ModID}:Buffer. NL Next turn, gain !M! Intangible. In 2 turns, lose !${ModID}:m2! Max HP.

${ModID}:Snip.NAME: Snip
${ModID}:Snip.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Retain. NL Trigger your next ${ModID}:Trap.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:Bide.NAME: Bide Time
${ModID}:Bide.DESCRIPTION: For X turns, gain !B! Block at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:Survey.NAME: Survey
${ModID}:Survey.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL For each Skill drawn, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Sap.NAME: Sap
${ModID}:Sap.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each unique debuff the enemy has. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Implode.NAME: Implode
${ModID}:Implode.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${ModID}:Blur. NL A random enemy gains !${ModID}:m2! Block and !${ModID}:m3! ${ModID}:Blur.

${ModID}:TinShield.NAME: Canned Block
${ModID}:TinShield.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Trap. NL Next turn, NL gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Hurl.NAME: Hurl
${ModID}:Hurl.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=Retain. NL }Choose a ${ModID}:Trap in your hand, draw pile or discard pile to trigger on an enemy.
